33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik said:"I shall narrate a Hadith to you that I heard from the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w), which none after me shall narrate that he heard it from the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w)." [He said:] "The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said: 'Indeed, among the signs of the Hour are that knowledge shall be raised up, ignorance shall be rampant, Zina shall abound, Khamr shall be drunk, women shall increase and men shall decrease such that fifty women will be supported by one man

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَشْرَاطِ السَّاعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About The Signs Of The Hour
